column3: and took the sheet of paper. I remembered soon after that
column5: I happened to look at the clock. It was eighteen minutes past five.

column1:
1718|5:18 P.M.|Thursday 5:18 P.M.
Yuri Andreevich was mad as hell. After his one-on-one with Tanzan Mino
column2: he knew he'd been screwed. Sticking a couple of "pilots" from Mino Industries in the cockpit. It was just the old GRU trick
column3: surveillance under the specious guise of "support." He'd seen it all before.
